pages.text: The $(item)Mystical Magnifier$() is a $(t:is a mod by vazkii)neat$() device for any magical botanist working with machinery. When equipped in either hand, and interacting with a compatible device, its $(thing)range of operation$() will be displayed around it, allowing any contraptions built with it to be inspected easily and precisely. To stop a device from displaying its range, simply interact with it a second time.
